Hello
I have a problem:
I have two computers connected to the network
1 - the first computer has a user name and password on the domain and access to the Internet via a proxy
2 - The second computer connected to the same network, but without the user within the domain and access to the Internet via the same proxy.

When the project used in the first computer does not show the map as they appear in the second computer you pictures facility



please : i want answer for this problem

GMapProvider.WebProxy = new WebProxy("127.0.0.1", 1080);
